mojo.description: This is a mojo to allow testing of the appfuse plugin and attribute manipulation.

parameter.name: projectName
parameter.description: The name of the project currently being built.

parameter.name: UserName
parameter.description: This is an attribute you can use to test and understand attrbute passing in this mojo. If you run mvn appfuse:hello you will get the default. You can change this by using mvn -Dappfuse.user.name=myname appfuse:helloname of the project currently being built. You can also set a user.name attrbute in the plugin confguration or pass it via settings in a pom, parent pom or settings.xml.
